fields.redirect_uri: The callback URL for your application
fields.ApiKeyAuth: a bearer token, including the prefix 'Bearer', e.g. 'Bearer abcde'

actions.description: Exchange the code passed to your redirect URI for an access_token
Exchange a refresh_token for an access_token

service_name.description: service_name for the chatbot name, which will be used to invoke queries and commands on interactive bots. No spaces, emoji or non-word characters are allowed, as you need to be able to call it like

command_url.description: command_url for the HTTPS url that Basecamp should call when the bot is addressed.

icon.description: icon for the new message type.
